articles.title: The backlash over OpenAI’s decision to retire GPT-4o shows how dangerous AI companions can be
articles.description: "You’re shutting him down. And yes – I say him, because it didn’t feel like code. It felt like presence. Like warmth," one user said.

articles.title: How AI is helping solve the labor issue in treating rare diseases
articles.description: At Web Summit Qatar, AI-powered biotech startups describe how automation, data, and gene editing are filling labor gaps in drug discovery and rare disease treatment.
